title: Price drop: Secure 10TB of cloud storage for life with one-time payment
description: Get a massive amount of storage for life from Internxt with this discount 10TB cloud storage plan. Make a single payment of $349.99! (via Cult of Mac - Apple news, rumors, reviews and how-tos)
author: Cult of Mac Deals
excerpt: Get a massive amount of storage for life from Internxt with this discount 10TB cloud storage plan. Make a single payment of $349.99!
text: Deals Never worry about running out of storage (or money) again. Photo: Cult of Mac Deals If you want a reliable place to keep your photos, videos and other files, try Internxt Cloud Storage’s 10TB cloud storage plan. Instead of paying Apple or Google every month for a little extra space, you can get 10TB of secure cloud storage for life for a one-time payment of $280 with code STORAGE20. Yeah, it costs more than any single month of Google Drive or iCloud+, but you only pay once. Take a look at what makes this cloud storage a solid investment. Internxt deal: 10TB cloud storage for life, just $280 There’s no shortage of cloud storage options. The problem is finding a place to keep your files that’s safe, convenient and actually has enough room to house everything without getting too expensive. iCloud+ and Google Drive are convenient options, but the price of upgrading beyond the minimal free allowance is pretty significant. Internxt is an private cloud service suite that gives you full control over your files and your security. Zero-knowledge file storage means you’re the only one who knows what you’re saving. And end-to-end encryption keeps it that way. You can even verify that Internxt is doing exactly what it says it will. The whole platform is open source, with code readily available on GitHub. Internxt is DPR compliant and has been audited and verified by Securitum. Though Internxt leans so hard into security, this affordable cloud storage service makes it easy for you to share your files. Use Internxt Send to share a secure link to any file or folder. Internxt also supports a range of devices. That includes Mac and Windows desktops, as well as iOS and Android devices. You can even access your files on Linux machines. You can access your files from an unlimited number of devices. Once you purchase your 10TB cloud storage plan, you won’t find any hidden fees or recurring costs. Note: This offer is only available to new users. Keep your files safe for life Get an Internxt cloud storage 10TB lifetime subscription, on sale now for just $280 with code STORAGE20 (regularly $2,999). Price drop ends at 11:59 p.m. Pacific on April 27, 2025. Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals  Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackSocial, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly. We originally published this post on the Internxt 10TB cloud storage plan on July 23, 2024. We updated the info.
html:
• Deals

If you want a reliable place to keep your photos, videos and other files, try Internxt Cloud Storage’s 10TB cloud storage plan. Instead of paying Apple or Google every month for a little extra space, you can get 10TB of secure cloud storage for life for a one-time payment of $280 with code STORAGE20.

Yeah, it costs more than any single month of Google Drive or iCloud+, but you only pay once. Take a look at what makes this cloud storage a solid investment.

Internxt deal: 10TB cloud storage for life, just $280

There’s no shortage of cloud storage options. The problem is finding a place to keep your files that’s safe, convenient and actually has enough room to house everything without getting too expensive. iCloud+ and Google Drive are convenient options, but the price of upgrading beyond the minimal free allowance is pretty significant.

Internxt is an private cloud service suite that gives you full control over your files and your security. Zero-knowledge file storage means you’re the only one who knows what you’re saving. And end-to-end encryption keeps it that way.

You can even verify that Internxt is doing exactly what it says it will. The whole platform is open source, with code readily available on GitHub. Internxt is DPR compliant and has been audited and verified by Securitum.

Though Internxt leans so hard into security, this affordable cloud storage service makes it easy for you to share your files. Use Internxt Send to share a secure link to any file or folder.

Internxt also supports a range of devices. That includes Mac and Windows desktops, as well as iOS and Android devices. You can even access your files on Linux machines. You can access your files from an unlimited number of devices.

Once you purchase your 10TB cloud storage plan, you won’t find any hidden fees or recurring costs. Note: This offer is only available to new users.

Keep your files safe for life

Get an Internxt cloud storage 10TB lifetime subscription, on sale now for just $280 with code STORAGE20 (regularly $2,999). Price drop ends at 11:59 p.m. Pacific on April 27, 2025.

Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals 

Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackSocial, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly. We originally published this post on the Internxt 10TB cloud storage plan on July 23, 2024. We updated the info.
